SpeedFeature.Name: Gift of Wind
SpeedFeature.Text: You gain a bonus to speed of 5 feet while you wear the armor, and if it normally imposes disadvantage on Stealth checks, it no longer does so.

MagicProperty.Name: Pennant of the Vind Rune (Amor)
MagicProperty.Description: The armor is now an uncommon magic item that requires attunement. You gain a bonus to speed of 5 feet while you wear the armor, and if it normally imposes disadvantage on Stealth checks, it no longer does so.
